file_content.text: Distress call from the Gravestone.
We're the last people Koth would ask for help.
Maybe he finally came around?
Answer the call. I want to hear him grovel.
Let him beg for my help.
Never change, lover.
Gravestone to Odessen, come in!
What do you want?
Vaylin and SCORPIO boarded the ship. They captured my crew and took the bridge.
That's a shame. I planned to kill you myself.
She's stealing my kill.
It's not too late, if you hurry.
I locked the controls and found a place to hide. You want the Gravestone? Come take it from Vaylin.
Lost him, but I have the coordinates.
I'd say "be careful," but I'm not stupid. Just don't die over a ship.
The Gravestone is a distraction. Strike down Vaylin and nothing will stand between you and the Eternal Throne.
Shields, weapons, and sensors remain offline. The Alliance fleet is hailing us.
Father's little meat puppet. How are you?
Just calling to make sure you're still there. I'll be right over.
You've made a big mistake.
I've never appreciated how funny you are.
Die with your fleet if you like, but you'll never stand on this bridge again.
We'll see about that.
Koth doesn't call for help, unless...
He got lonely?
Cut the chatter. Answer it!
Hurry up and answer the call.
We're lucky the signal came in at all. Someone's trying to jam it, big time. Hang on... got it!
Mayday! Mayday! Is anybody there?
We read you, Koth. What happened?
Vaylin and SCORPIO tricked their way on board. They've taken the bridge and my crew.
You can't face them alone. Abandon ship while you can.
Get to an escape pod.
I'm not leaving my people--or the Gravestone.
Got a few tricks of my own to keep them busy. Care to join the party?
You're surrounded, Vaylin. Surrender the Gravestone and release the crew unharmed.
Leave before people get hurt.
You are aggressively dull.
I disappear on Dromund Kaas for one day... Open the channel.
Great, another emergency.
He's in trouble. Answer the call.
I have a bad feeling.
Always a charmer.
I don't want his apology--just the Gravestone.
It better be about my ship.
He wouldn't reach out unless it was serious. Open the channel.
We'll hear him out.
You left the Alliance, took my ship, and now you want help.
You have a lot of nerve, Koth.
You let our best weapon against the Eternal Fleet fall to Vaylin.
The enemy has our best ship.
I'll scramble the fleet. Find a place to hide until we're there.
Help is on the way.
You will not let them take the Gravestone. Period.
Defend my ship at all costs.
The signal's jammed big time on the other end. Almost got it... there!
Hold on, the signal's jammed on the other end. One second... got it!
I'm trying, but the signal's jammed big time on the other end. Hold on... got it!
Wasn't planning to give up.
I got some tricks up my sleeve, but we don't have long.
Don't do it for me. Do it for the ship.
Not yet, I haven't.
You've taken my ship. Now I'm going to end you.
I'll destroy you for this.
I knew you would make this fun.
